languages.text: "Как скажете, Ваша Светлость. Человек, выдающий себя за лорда Моллеса, признан виновным в намеренном введении в заблуждение семьи Моллес и в присвоении личности дворянина. Наказание: казнь. Привести в исполнение!"
languages.translation_comment:
После куя кадр на весы. Склоняется чаша со свитком. Стартует сцена казни Лорда
После кадр возвращается на РТ

После куя кадр на весы. Склоняется чаша со свитком. Стартует сцена казни Лорда
После кадр возвращается на РТ

languages.text: "As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"
languages.original_text: "Как скажете, Ваша Светлость. Человек, выдающий себя за лорда Моллеса, признан виновным в намеренном введении в заблуждение семьи Моллес и в присвоении личности дворянина. Наказание: казнь. Привести в исполнение!"

traits.locale_text: "As you say, Rogue Trader. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

"As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

"As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Mann, der sich als Lord Molles ausgibt, wird der bewussten Täuschung der Molles-Familie und des Diebstahls der Identität eines Adeligen für schuldig befunden. Seine Strafe ist der Tod. Vollstreckt das Urteil!"
languages.original_text: "As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Mann, der sich als Lord Molles ausgibt, wird der bewussten Täuschung der Molles-Familie und des Diebstahls der Identität eines Adeligen für schuldig befunden. Seine Strafe ist der Tod. Vollstreckt das Urteil!"

languages.text: « Très juste, Votre Seigneurie. L'homme qui se fait passer pour le seigneur Molles est reconnu coupable d'avoir délibérément trompé la famille Molles et usurpé l'identité d'un noble. Son châtiment sera la mort. Exécutez la sentence ! »
languages.original_text: "As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

traits.locale_text: « Très juste, Votre Seigneurie. L'homme qui se fait passer pour le seigneur Molles est reconnu coupable d'avoir délibérément trompé la famille Molles et usurpé l'identité d'un noble. Son châtiment sera la mort. Exécutez la sentence ! »

languages.text: “如您所言，大人。冒充莫莱斯勋爵的男子犯下了蓄意欺骗莫莱斯家族、窃取贵族身份的罪行，在此判处死刑。执行判决！”
languages.original_text: "As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

traits.locale_text: “如您所言，大人。冒充莫莱斯勋爵的男子犯下了蓄意欺骗莫莱斯家族、窃取贵族身份的罪行，在此判处死刑。执行判决！”

languages.text: «Como ordene, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El hombre que afirma ser lord Molles es culpable de engañar a la familia Molles y suplantar la identidad de un noble. Su castigo es la muerte. ¡Ejecuten la sentencia!».
languages.original_text: "As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

traits.locale_text: «Como ordene, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El hombre que afirma ser lord Molles es culpable de engañar a la familia Molles y suplantar la identidad de un noble. Su castigo es la muerte. ¡Ejecuten la sentencia!».

languages.text: 「おっしゃるとおりです、閣下。モレス公を装った男は、意図的にモレス家を欺き、貴族の身分を盗んだ罪で有罪となる。罰は死刑とする。刑を執行せよ！」
languages.original_text: "As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

traits.locale_text: 「おっしゃるとおりです、閣下。モレス公を装った男は、意図的にモレス家を欺き、貴族の身分を盗んだ罪で有罪となる。罰は死刑とする。刑を執行せよ！」

languages.text: "Emriniz olur {mf|Lordum|Leydim}. Kendini Lord Molles olarak tanıtan adam, Molles ailesini kasten aldatmaktan ve bir soylunun kimliğini çalmaktan suçlu bulunmuştur. Cezası ölüm olacaktır. Cezayı infaz edin!"
languages.original_text: "As you say, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The man posing as Lord Molles is found guilty of deliberately deceiving the Molles family and stealing a nobleman's identity. His punishment will be death. Carry out the sentence!"

traits.locale_text: "Emriniz olur {mf|Lordum|Leydim}. Kendini Lord Molles olarak tanıtan adam, Molles ailesini kasten aldatmaktan ve bir soylunun kimliğini çalmaktan suçlu bulunmuştur. Cezası ölüm olacaktır. Cezayı infaz edin!"
